scripts.build: npm run log:begin -s "Building Dist" && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="./webpack/tsconfig.json" webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.config.ts
scripts.check:all: npm run check:eslint -s && npm run check:prettier -s
scripts.check:eslint: npm run log:begin -s "ESLint Checking" && eslint --ext=.js,.ts,.jsx,.tsx . && npm run log:end -s
scripts.clean:dirs: npm run log:begin -s "Cleaning Build Dirs" && del-cli ./dist/* ./cache/* -f && npm run log:end -s
scripts.create:dirs: npm run log:begin -s "Creating Dirs (If Missing)" && mkdirp ./cache ./dist ./src ./test && npm run log:end -s
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:eslint -s && npm run fix:prettier -s
scripts.fix:eslint: npm run log:begin -s "ESLint Fixing" && eslint --fix --ext=.js,.ts,.jsx,.tsx . && npm run log:end -s
scripts.prebuild: npm run check:prettier -s && npm run test -s && npm run clean:dirs -s
scripts.test: npm run log:begin -s "Running All Tests" && jest
scripts.test:dev: npm run log:begin -s "Running Dev Test" && jest --
scripts.update:check-latest: npm run log:begin -s "Checking Latest Updates" && npm-check-updates
scripts.update:install-latest-unsafe: npm run log:begin -s "Updating Latest (Unsafe)" && npm-check-updates -u && npm install
scripts.update:install-safe: npm run log:begin -s "Updating (Safe)" && npm update && npm run log:end -s
